import { Button, Checkbox, Dialog, DialogActions, DialogContent, DialogContentText, DialogTitle, Divider, FormControlLabel, FormGroup, Grid, TextField, Typography } from "@material-ui/core"; import { useState } from "react"; const OptionDialog = ({openDialog,closeDialog}) => { const [envs, setEnvs] = useState([ {name:"Production",checked:true}, {name:"Validation",checked:true}, {name:"Integration",checked:true}, {name:"DÃ©veloppement",checked:true} ]) const checkEnv = (environnement) =>{ envs.map(env =>{ env.name === environnement ? env.checked = !env.checked : env.checked = env.checked }) console.log("envs ",envs) } return (
Options Personnaliser votre Ã©xÃ©cution en fonction des environnements. Environnement : { envs.map(env =>( checkEnv(e.target.name)} />} label={env.name} /> ))} Resultat attendu : Bloquante : } label="Oui" /> } label="Non" /> *N'arrÃªte pas l'exÃ©cution de Jenkins*
); } export default OptionDialog;
